revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=GlobalScale |model=GuruPlug |revision=Server Plus (US Edition) |price=99 |fcc_date=04/23/2010 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=plug computer |fcc_id=YCJ003GP |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281;88F6281A2; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Samsung |fla1_model=K9F4G08U0B-PCB0 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=E1108AFBG-8E-F |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, eSATA 2.0, microSD Card slot |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_module=AzureWave AW-GH381 |wi1_module_if=SDIO (module) |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8688 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1121R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=USB 2.0 Interface Flash Card Reader Controller;Genesys;GL836;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1; |flags=Bluetooth 2.1 EDR, CMOS battery backup, schematics, block diagram |stock_boot=U-Boot;2009.11-rc1 |stock_os=Linux;2.6.32;Debian 5.0.3 |tp_firmware=Deb |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=Plug2-uAP-XXXX, |default_ssid_regex=^Plug2-uAP-[a-f0-9]{4}$, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=nosoup4u |oui=00:24:23 |oui_eth=00:50:43 }} {{TagLine|GuruPlug Server Plus}} :[http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/t-guruplugdetails.aspx Product page] {{â€¢}} [http://www.globalscaletechnologies.com/skins/skin_1/images/gpsp_blockdiagram.jpg Block diagram]
Schematics and a block diagram of the device are available in the FCC docs. :The "Plus" edition is also referred to as "Luxury Edition".
Per the FCC docs... *This device is using the following '''Genesys Logic''' chips :GL836 SD/MMC/MS card reader IC :GL850G USB 2.0 hub IC *The model nubmer is 003-GP11A101. *"SheevaPlug2_F2 V02", "WWW.GLOBALSCALETECHNOLOGIES.COM", :and the '''GlobalScale''' logo is silkscreened on the expansion board. :"0F5V3A", "2010130", and "REV B" is silkscreened on the power supply module.
Additional specifications, per '''GlobalScale''''s product page, are below... *Expansion IFs: 1x eSATA 2.0, 2x USB 2.0, 2x microSD (1x internal, 1x external) *Development IFs: 1x Mini-USB port (n/s A/B type connector), UART, and JTAG :Dimensions (LxWxH): [[Dimensions::95 mm x 65 mm x 48.5 mm]] :Internal power: 5V, 3.0A
*[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uJCN-8ljgVM ''GuruPlug Server Plus: Unboxing'' on '''YouTube'''] *[http://bzed.de/posts/2010/09/refactoring_the_guruplug_server_plus/ ''Refactoring the guruplug server plus'' on '''bzed.de''']
===See also=== *[[GlobalScale Devices]]
